thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Niche Internet Real Estate Business

title: Niche Internet Real Estate Business
text: Questions Business Summary For sale is a membership site Internet business in a hot real estate niche with recurring revenue and a strong upward trend. This business has generated $279,063 in revenue and $169,595 in profit in 2013 and continues to grow at a steady rate with approximately 8,000 past customers and over 80,000 prospects. This is a great lifestyle business - it can be run from anywhere in the world and the current owner only spends 5-10 hours/week on it. Everything is outsourced, including the content creation for the paid membership (so it is not dependent on the owner). This business has very stable and steady systems that work to produce consistent revenue and profit each month. The market itself is growing, insuring long term profit with additional revenue streams that can be added on. One recently added revenue source brought in $125,000. For additional marketing the owner recently added a mobile app that is ranking very well in the financial categories (Top 15-25 finance apps in Canada) is and driving sales for the website. The mobile app has done 12,000 downloads in the last 30 days and over 30,000 total downloads. The business includes highly effective marketing systems and profitable backend integrated marketing. The business is highly scalable by simply sending more traffic. Key Highlights: - Consistent growth 3 years straight - Stable and solid revenue - Easily expand into new geographical markets - Minimal time and effort to run the business - Highly effective lead capture system and marketing funnels - Army of built in affiliates and Joint Venture Partners - Recurring revenue model where customers happily pay a subscription for the service provided - Ranked #1 for many major search terms - 50,000+ unique visitors per month. - Includes lists of 8000 customers and over 80,000 prospects. - Mobile app released for additional exposure - If you are looking for a proven, growing business that is scaleable this is a gr Financials
